title: Report: Oilers, Klefbom agree to terms on 7-year extension
content:
The Edmonton Oilers have reportedly agreed to terms on a seven-year contract extension with Oscar Klefbom , according to TSN's Ryan Rishaug . 

He expects the agreement, which will pay the defenseman a little more than $4 million per season, to be finalized in the next 24-48 hours. 

More to come.
